title: CCRAS Recruitment 2026 - Walk-in-Interview for 03 Senor Research Fellow Posts
description: The Central Council for Research in Ayurvedic Sciences (CCRAS) has declared the official notification for 2026. To fill up the vacancies for 03 Senior Research Fellow Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the Any Degree, BAMS, can grab this chance and apply for the CCRAS Recruitment 2026 . Interested candidates can attend the walk-in at the addres below. Here, we mentioned the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these...
